home.Tools: React.js | TailWind | JavaScript | TypeScript | HTML | CSS
home.intro: I specialize in building dynamic, responsive websites.Turning ideas into interactive experiences with React & Tailwind, CSS—crafting seamless designs, smooth interactions, and modern experiences that truly bring your ideas to life.

about.title: About Me
about.description: With over 3 years in frontend development, I specialize in creating responsive, interactive, and visually engaging web applications. I focus on blending performance, accessibility, and modern animations to deliver user-friendly experiences that bring ideas to life.

frameworks.title: Frameworks
frameworks.descFramework1: A powerful JavaScript library for building fast, interactive, and component-based user interfaces.
frameworks.descFramework2: A utility-first CSS framework for creating modern, responsive designs with clean and reusable classes.
frameworks.descFramework3: A React animation library that makes it easy to add smooth, interactive, and production-ready animations.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Here are some of the works i've completed!!
projects.P1description: Built the SafePazz Dashboard, used by estates and organizations to secure, regulate and document the activities of occupants, employees, and visitors.
projects.P2description: Developed the Harmony Portal Dashboard, enabling investors to market and manage properties effectively.
projects.P3description: This is a simple and personal project of mine, its a CRUD/e-commerce application hosted on Firebase.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.description: Feel free to reach out for collaborations. I can't wait to work with you.
